Why Work Of10

Home Base

Forget the rules and conventions of a rigid corp office; make your workspace your home

Community

Learn from and be inspired by the people around you; make friends, network and meet your next partner, client, or investor!

Location

Work within a neo classical architectural marvel - Hiranandani Gardens; be spoilt for choice with cafes, restaurants and bars

Culture

Experience the vibrant and diverse start-up culture of Powai, India’s very own Silicon Valley

Amenities

High Speed Wi-Fi, delicious hot beverages to fuel you, printing and scanning and much more

Event Space

Attend curated events like book readings, hackathons and impromptu think tanks by members and noted speakers. Better yet, host your own!

Powai just got a lot cooler...
